note.p: MS annotation by M: ' Answ 17/10/93'. Letter not found. George A. Hunter was manager of the pharmaceutical business of P. H. W. Johnson & Co. (Albany advertiser, 25 March 1899, p. 3).

cell.style: padding-left: 0.0556in; padding-right: 0.0556in; padding-top: 0in; padding-bottom: 0in; border: none;

seg.style: color: #0070c0; font-family: Times; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal;

div.p: We are forwarding by parcel post a fruit [or] seed which was picked up by Mr [Johnson] at a place some few miles from here. Not having come across one like it before he was curious to find out what it is. We should be glad if you would supply us with the information if it is not giving you too much trouble. Thanking you in anticipation
